curam.util.workflow.impl
Class WorkflowDeadlineAdmin

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.workflow.base.WorkflowDeadlineAdmin
      curam.util.workflow.impl.WorkflowDeadlineAdmin
All Implemented Interfaces:
curam.util.workflow.intf.WorkflowDeadlineAdmin
public abstract class WorkflowDeadlineAdmin
extends curam.util.workflow.base.WorkflowDeadlineAdmin

The WorkflowDeadline entity stores details of the length of time that a Task or EventWait is allowed to remain unprocessed. This API provides functions to manipulate the data on the WorkflowDeadline and its functions should be used rather than direct access to the functions present on the actual entity.

Method Detail

read

public WorkflowDeadlineInfo read(long deadlineID)
                          throws AppException,
                                 InformationalException
Returns the details of the specified workflow deadline.

Parameters:
deadlineID - The unique identifier of the workflow deadline.
Returns:
The details of the specified workflow deadline.
Throws:
AppException - ID_WORKFLOW_DEADLINE_DOES_NOT_EXIST - if Workflow Deadline with specified identifier does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

create

public long create(long activityInstanceID,
                   DateTime deadlineTime,
                   java.lang.String deadlineType,
                   boolean suspended,
                   long taskID)
            throws AppException,
                   InformationalException
Creates a workflow deadline.

Parameters:
activityInstanceID - The unique identifier of the activity instance associated with this workflow deadline.
deadlineTime - The time at which the workflow deadline times out. For a manual activity or a decision activity workflow deadline, this time is calculated by adding the deadline duration specified to the time that the associated manual activity task was created. For an event wait workflow deadline, the time is calculated by adding the deadline duration specified to the time that the associated event wait activity was executed.
deadlineType - The type of the workflow deadline (as deadlines may be associated with a number of activity types including manual activities, event wait activities and decision activities).
suspended - NOTE: This flag provides no functional benefit at present. In the future, if the functionality becomes available, this flag could set set to true to indicate that the handler function associated with the workflow deadline was invoked but failed. This flag may be then be used to filter out deadlines that were previously handled but failed when scanning for workflow deadlines.
taskID - The unique identifier of a task associated with a workflow deadline. This field is not set for deadlines associated with event wait activities.
Returns:
The unique identifier of the newly created workflow deadline.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

modify

public void modify(long deadlineID,
                   long activityInstanceID,
                   DateTime deadlineTime,
                   java.lang.String deadlineType,
                   boolean suspended,
                   long taskID,
                   int versionNo)
            throws AppException,
                   InformationalException
Modifies the details of a workflow deadline.

Parameters:
deadlineID - The unique identifier of the workflow deadline.
activityInstanceID - The unique identifier of the activity instance associated with this workflow deadline.
deadlineTime - The time at which the workflow deadline times out. For a manual activity or a decision activity workflow deadline, this time is calculated by adding the deadline duration specified to the time that the associated manual activity task was created. For an event wait workflow deadline, the time is calculated by adding the deadline duration specified to the time that the associated event wait activity was executed.
deadlineType - The type of the workflow deadline (as deadlines may be associated with a number of activity types including manual activities, event wait activities and decision activities).
suspended - NOTE: This flag provides no functional benefit at present. In the future, if the functionality becomes available, this flag could set set to true to indicate that the handler function associated with the workflow deadline was invoked but failed. This flag may be then be used to filter out deadlines that were previously handled but failed when scanning for workflow deadlines.
taskID - The unique identifier of a task associated with a workflow deadline. This field is not set for deadlines associated with event wait activities.
versionNo - The version number for optimistic locking.
Throws:
AppException - Exceptions that may occur when modifying the details of a workflow deadline.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

            throws AppException,

Removes a workflow deadline. If the record does not exist, the RecordNotFoundException is caught and the function does nothing.

This flag may be then be used to filter out deadlines that were previously handled but failed when scanning for workflow deadlines.

scanWorkflowDeadlines

public ScanWorkflowDeadlineDetailsList scanWorkflowDeadlines(DateTime currentTime)
                                                      throws AppException,
                                                             InformationalException
Returns a list of all the task deadlines that have timed out. A task deadline times out when the deadline time stored as part of the workflow deadline record has been exceeded by the current date time.

Parameters:
currentTime - The current date and time that will be used to scan the workflow deadline table for expired deadlines.
Returns:
A list of all the task deadlines that have timed out. A task deadline times out when the deadline time stored as part of the deadline record has been exceeded by the current date time.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

modifyDeadline

public void modifyDeadline(long taskID,
                           DateTime deadlineTime,
                           int versionNo)
                    throws AppException,
                           InformationalException
Changes the deadline time of a workflow deadline record for a specified task.

Parameters:
taskID - The unique identifier of a task associated with a workflow deadline.
deadlineTime - The time at which the workflow deadline times out.
versionNo - The version number for optimistic locking.
Throws:
AppException - Exceptions that may occur when modifying the deadline date and time of a workflow deadline record.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
